actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation

official_title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to eliminate the social security offset from annuities under the Survivor Benefit Plan to the extent that any social security annuity of the Survivor Benefit Plan annuitant is reduced because of a public retirement benefit received by the annuitant based on the annuitant's own employment.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Eliminates the social security offset against annuities provided under the Survivor Benefit Plan of the armed service when the benefits received are based on the annuitant's own employment in government.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to eliminate the social security offset from annuities under the Survivor Benefit Plan to the extent that any social security annuity of the Survivor Benefit Plan annuitant is reduced because of a public retirement benefit received by the annuitant based on the annuitant's own employment.
